snippet: Bob and Mike Bryan topped the British duo of Colin Fleming and Dominic Inglot to pull the United States to within 1-2 in a World Group first-round battle.
abstract: World's No 1 men's doubles team Bob and Mike Bryan keep United States' hopes alive with victory over British duo Colin Fleming and Dominic Inglot in Davis Cup competition; other tennis news noted.
lead_paragraph: Bob and Mike Bryan topped the British duo of Colin Fleming and Dominic Inglot to pull the United States to within 1-2 in a World Group first-round battle.

headline.main: Bryans Rescue U.S.; Swiss, Germans and French Advance
